content: this shawl uses a single color small motifs and chain stitches to produce a tartan-like appearance the yarn used is a linen/bamboo/cotton blend which gives a lovely drape and its timeless style will make it a go-to accessory in your wardrobe the pattern uses breakaway crochet techniques which makes it possible to seamlessly incorporate the small motif as you go you essentially need to learn only a few row that repeat throuhout and once you learn the pattern sequence it is easy to modify the size of the shawl a youtube tutorial 1 is also available 1 https //youtu be/ahrovfit3q0
